pesticide.PPE: Long-sleeved shirt and long pants, Shoes plus socks
pesticide.trade_Name: Farm General 41% Glyphosate Grass & Weed Killer

Active_Ingredients.name: Glyphosate, N-(phosphonomethyl) glycine, in the form of its isopropylamine salt
Active_Ingredients.mode_Of_Action: Inhibits an enzyme found only in plants that is essential to formation of specific amino acids

Safety_Information.general_Info: Causes moderate eye irritation. Avoid contact with eyes or clothing. Wash thoroughly with soap and water after handling. DOMESTIC ANIMALS: This product is relatively nontoxic to dogs and other domestic animals; ingestion may result in temporary gastrointestinal irritation.
Safety_Information.if_In_Eyes: Hold eye open and rinse slowly and gently with water for 15-20 minutes. Remove contact lenses, if present, after the first 5 minutes, then continue rinsing eye. Call a poison control center or doctor for treatment advice. Have the product container or label with you when calling.
Safety_Information.physician_Note: In the event of a medical emergency, call your poison control center at 1-800-222-1222 or for chemical emergency assistance call CHEMTREC® at 1-800-424-9300.
